hero.title: Our Story
hero.subtitle: Traditional Ghanaian cuisine passed down through generations

story.title: The Osei Serwaa Legacy
story.paragraph: Founded in 2010 by Master Chef Kwame Osei and his wife Serwa, our kitchen brings the authentic flavors of Ghana to food lovers worldwide.

team.name: Kwame Osei
team.bio: With over 20 years of culinary experience, Chef Kwame brings traditional Ghanaian flavors to life.

team.name: Serwa Osei
team.bio: Serwa ensures every guest feels at home with her warm hospitality and attention to detail.

team.name: Akua Mensah
team.bio: Specializing in traditional soups and stews, Chef Akua maintains our authentic taste.

values.title: Authenticity
values.description: We stay true to traditional Ghanaian recipes and cooking methods.

values.title: Passion
values.description: Every dish is prepared with love and dedication to our craft.

values.title: Community
values.description: We believe in bringing people together through food and shared experiences.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We strive for perfection in every aspect of our service and cuisine.
